languages.text: "Ты зря скрыла от меня правду. Я бы и не подумал{mf||а} тебя осуждать. Теодора заслужила смерть за свое предательство, а остальные... допустимый побочный ущерб".

traits.locale_text: "Ты зря скрыла от меня правду. Я бы и не подумал{mf||а} тебя осуждать. Теодора заслужила смерть за свое предательство, а остальные... допустимый побочный ущерб".

languages.text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."
languages.original_text: "Ты зря скрыла от меня правду. Я бы и не подумал{mf||а} тебя осуждать. Теодора заслужила смерть за свое предательство, а остальные... допустимый побочный ущерб".

"You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

"You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

languages.text: 「真実を話すべきだったな。非難される理由などない。シオドーラは裏切り者。死んで当然だった。他の犠牲者については…避けようがなかったのだから仕方がない」
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: 「真実を話すべきだったな。非難される理由などない。シオドーラは裏切り者。死んで当然だった。他の犠牲者については…避けようがなかったのだから仕方がない」

languages.text: “你本该告诉我真相才对，我没有任何理由谴责你的做法。西奥多拉背叛了帝国，理当被判处死刑。至于其他受害者……算是可以接受的附带损害。”
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: “你本该告诉我真相才对，我没有任何理由谴责你的做法。西奥多拉背叛了帝国，理当被判处死刑。至于其他受害者……算是可以接受的附带损害。”

languages.text: «Debería haberme dicho la verdad. No veo razón para condenarla. Theodora merecía morir por su traición. En cuanto a las demás víctimas... fueron daños colaterales aceptables».
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: «Debería haberme dicho la verdad. No veo razón para condenarla. Theodora merecía morir por su traición. En cuanto a las demás víctimas... fueron daños colaterales aceptables».

languages.text: "Ihr hättet mir die Wahrheit sagen sollen. Ich sehe keinen Grund, Euch zu verdammen. Theodora hat es verdient, für ihren Verrat zu sterben. Und was die anderen Opfer angeht ... das waren akzeptable Kollateralschäden."
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet mir die Wahrheit sagen sollen. Ich sehe keinen Grund, Euch zu verdammen. Theodora hat es verdient, für ihren Verrat zu sterben. Und was die anderen Opfer angeht ... das waren akzeptable Kollateralschäden."

languages.text: « Vous auriez dû me dire la vérité dès le début. Je ne vois aucune raison de vous condamner. Théodora méritait de mourir pour son hérésie. Quant aux autres victimes... Aussi malheureux que ça puisse paraître, elles n'étaient que des victimes des circonstances. »
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez dû me dire la vérité dès le début. Je ne vois aucune raison de vous condamner. Théodora méritait de mourir pour son hérésie. Quant aux autres victimes... Aussi malheureux que ça puisse paraître, elles n'étaient que des victimes des circonstances. »

languages.text: "Bana doğruyu söylemen gerekirdi. Seni suçlamak için bir sebep göremiyorum. Theodora, ihaneti yüzünden ölmeyi hak etmiş. Etmeyenlere gelirsek... Kurunun yanında yaş da yanar demişler."
languages.original_text: "You should have told me the truth. I see no reason to condemn you. Theodora deserved to die for her treachery. As for any other victims... it was acceptable collateral damage."

traits.locale_text: "Bana doğruyu söylemen gerekirdi. Seni suçlamak için bir sebep göremiyorum. Theodora, ihaneti karşılığında ölümü hak etmişti. Etmeyenlere gelirsek... Kurunun yanında yaş da yanar demişler."
